results.title: Don't stand so close to me
results.brief_description: On the threshold of year 12 Morgan Preston seems to have everything under control. She has a best friend, is familiar with the teachers, and is keeping on top of the ever increasing amount of homework. Morgan’s stability is threatened with the arrival of a new history teacher, Jack Hamilton. Jack and Morgan develop an unusual relationship that challenges the boundaries of conformity and forces both of them into a moral dilemma. Cast includes Alison Gordon, Luke Dean, Georgina McClure and Maureen Sherlock.

results.title: Don't move = Non ti muovere
results.creator_credit: Sergio Castellitto, Giovanni Stabilini, Marco Chimenz, Riccardo Tozzi, Cattleya and Medusa Film
results.brief_description: As his teenage daughter’s life hangs in the balance, a surgeon recalls crucial moments of his life, including an angst-ridden affair with a marginalised Albanian woman (a seriously de-glamorised Penelope Cruz) who he raped, but subsequently became sexually and emotionally entangled with. Adapted from the best-selling novel by Margaret Mazzantini, Castellitto (who also wrote the screenplay and previously directed the charming drama “Mostly Martha”) presents an unflattering view of male anguish, betrayal and brutality as Timoteo becomes conflicted by his double life as an urbane husband on the one hand and a violent lover to a troubled waif, living in abject conditions, on the other.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sergio Castellitto, Giovanni Stabilini, Marco Chimenz, Riccardo Tozzi, Cattleya and Medusa Film

results.title: Don't knock the ox
results.creator_credit: Tony Ianzelo, William Canning and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: The International Ox Pull, highlight of the Bridgewater, Nova Scotia, annual fair, is a holdover from the pioneer past when oxen cleared the land and tilled the soil. That these great beasts of burden have lost none of their pulling power is well demonstrated as they drag tons of weight loaded on sleds (the winner pulls up to six tons). Competing teams come from various parts of the Maritimes and the northeastern United States.

results.title: Don't eat the pictures
results.brief_description: This zany musical follows the adventures of Big Bird, Smiffy, Cookie Monster and the rest of the Sesame Street gang as they find themselves accidentally locked in the Metro Museum overnight. Featuring cameo appearances by James Mason, Fritz Weaver and Paul Dooley.

results.title: Perfect strangers
results.creator_credit: Stephen Poliakoff, John Chapman and BBC
results.brief_description: A drama with family, immigration and belonging the main themes. With a dreamy and slow atmosphere, this family history story unfolds with the use of family photographs as story telling tools. It’s a moving series about relationships and ancestors, history and reunion. Cast includes Michael Gambon and Lindsay Duncan.

results.title: Dominators: Smith, Hayes, Cummings (S)
results.brief_description: Bart Cummings, Colin Hayes and Tommy Smith, Australia’s legendary trio of racehorse trainers. Their notoriety extends beyond the profession they have dominated for decades. Each of them possess a natural affinity with the horse: individually gifted with that enigmatic sixth sense. Record breaking achievements distinguish them from their contemporaries by the length of the Flemington straight. Their amazing winning formula applies not to hundreds of races, but thousands. Between them they’ve won 73 Derbies, 50 Oaks, 11 Cox Plates, 13 Melbourne Cups and 11 Golden Slippers. This is their success story.

results.title: Domestic Play (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Ann Sharp, Kathleen Manning, Drake Educational Associates and Video Lock Educational
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Structuring Play in the Infant School No.2”.
Identifies the different kinds of teacher involvement in domestic play. Domestic play includes mothers and fathers, dolls, shopping, cooking, cleaning, washing, furnishing the house, and hospitals

results.title: Structuring Play (TEFC)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Structuring Play in the Infant School No.1”.
An introductory tape explaining the projects work and ideas. Discusses the structure of the school and classroom and records the play occurring in four classes

results.title: Playing Outdoors (TEFC)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Structuring Play in the Infant School No.6”.
This tape covers all the categories of play shown in the other tapes in the series taken outdoors. It discusses the advantages and problems for both teachers and children of taking play outside
